description: The heaviest rainfall on record in parts of central China triggered heavy flooding. Rescue workers assisted people trapped in buses, houses, and buildings.
title: Heavy Rains Cause Flooding in China
title_page: Heavy Rains Cause Flooding in China - The New York Times
